All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTag, jakarta.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, jakarta.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, jakarta.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag, Serializable, Cloneable
public class GridRowStateComponent extends OptionStateComponent
Class that defines the criteria to render grid rows with different styles.
